reuters.title: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN FURTHER 104 MLN STG HELP
reuters.body: The Bank of England said it provided the money market with assistance of 104 mln stg in the afternoon session. This takes the bank's total help so far today to 219 mln stg and compares with its estimate of a 300 mln stg shortage. The central bank bought outright 104 mln stg in bank bills in band two at 9-13/16 pct. REUTER 
